Lyric:
[00:07.20]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:11.64]Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark
[00:16.14]Finally I can see you crystal clear
[00:20.80]Go ahead and sell me out and I'll lay your ship bare
[00:25.31]See how I leave with every piece of you
[00:29.85]Don't underestimate the things that I will do
[00:34.36]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:38.92]Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark
[00:44.56]The scars of your love remind me of us
[00:48.74]They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[00:53.66]The scars of your love they leave me breathless
[00:58.34]I can't help feeling
[01:00.49]We could have had it all
[01:05.20]Rolling in the Deep
[01:09.64]Your had my heart Inside of your hand
[01:14.75]And you played it To the beat (Rolling in the deep)
[01:20.01]Baby I have no story to be told
[01:24.62]But I've heard one of you and I'm gonna make your head burn
[01:29.34]Think of me in the depths of your despair
[01:33.80]Making a home down there as mine sure won't be shared
[01:39.28]The scars of your love remind you of us
[01:43.60]They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[01:48.54]The scars of your love they leave me breathless
[01:53.04]I can't help feeling
[01:55.26]We could have had it all
[02:00.13]Rolling in the Deep
[02:04.45]Your had my heart inside of your hand
[02:09.61]And you played it
[02:11.90]To the beat
[02:13.79]Could have had it all
[02:18.39]Rolling in the deep
[02:22.69]You had my heart inside of your hand
[02:27.87]But you played it with your beating
[02:33.17]Throw yourself through ever open door
[02:37.80]Count your blessings to find what look for
[02:42.41]Turn my sorrow into treasured gold
[02:46.76]And pay me back in kind- You reap just what you sow
[02:54.84]We could have had it all
[02:59.36]We could have had it all yeah
[03:05.11]It all
[03:06.20]It all It all
[03:08.45]We could have had it all

[03:17.57]You had my heart inside of your hand
[03:22.69]And you played it to the beat
